description: [Clambling](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0660) can store a file named `mpsvc.dll`, which opens a malicious `mpsvc.mui` file, in the same folder as the legitimate Microsoft executable `MsMpEng.exe` to gain execution.(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Talent-Jump Clambling February 2020)

external_references.description: Chen, T. and Chen, Z. (2020, February 17). CLAMBLING - A New Backdoor Base On Dropbox. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
Lunghi, D. et al. (2020, February). Uncovering DRBControl. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
